html: MPs asked Theresa May why she’s making the UK a defence rule-taker. May responded by naming the 10% of EU military schemes she’s NOT keeping us in. ‘We’re not in PESCO or a future EU army.’ The UK is set to remain in EVERY other EU military merger scheme. Unacceptable!pic.twitter.com/m4clso5RZ5
text:
MPs asked Theresa May why she’s making the UK a defence rule-taker.
May responded by naming the 10% of EU military schemes she’s NOT keeping us in.
‘We’re not in PESCO or a future EU army.’
The UK is set to remain in EVERY other EU military merger scheme.  
Unacceptable!pic.twitter.com/m4clso5RZ5

html: Good meetings with senior politicians & trade officials in Washington. Real enthusiasm for UK/US Free Trade Deal, but unanimous it is impossible unless UK controls its own tariffs and regulatory environment. So Draft Withdrawal Agreement stops all new trading relationships.

html: Under May’s deal, new FTAs would be made highly improbable due to: 1) Any new deals needing EU approval. 2) The UK being trapped in the Customs Union indefinitely. The UK would remain bound by the rules of the EU, but with no say & no means of escape.https://iea.org.uk/media/iea-briefing-dissects-draft-withdrawal-agreement/ …
text:
Under May’s deal, new FTAs would be made highly improbable due to:

1) Any new deals needing EU approval. 
2) The UK being trapped in the Customs Union indefinitely.

The UK would remain bound by the rules of the EU, but with no say & no means of escape.https://iea.org.uk/media/iea-briefing-dissects-draft-withdrawal-agreement/ …

html: Since the EU was founded there have been 48 referendums on integration and accession, of the 48, not once has there been a re-run when the result was in favour of integration, but when they've gone against, the EU has always asked the member state to vote until they get it right.pic.twitter.com/IZnxEHK8kv

html: I have argued for more Police for Romford for as long as I have been an MP, but it’s the Mayor of London who decides on the allocation police resources, not MPs. The Mayor must give greater priority to outer London areas like Havering and I will continue to demand this!

html: Today marks the 74th anniversary of the Normandy Landings. @GavinWilliamson : “The breath-taking bravery and ingenuity shown during those days still echo through today’s Armed Forces. We will never forget the debt we owe them for the peace and freedom we now enjoy.”pic.twitter.com/oTNu2gplHk
text:
Today marks the 74th anniversary of the Normandy Landings.
